00007                                                      {
00008   /* Get pedestal */
00009   if (pulses && pulses->GetEntries()) {
00010     // First reduce range slightly; specifically Ge preamp reset caused flatlining
00011     static const int nBinsIgnore = 5; // This number is arbitrary. Logically it should be 1, maybe 2, but 5 can't hurt
00012     int nbins = pulses->GetXaxis()->GetNbins();
00013     pulses->GetXaxis()->SetRange(nBinsIgnore, nbins - nBinsIgnore);
00014     // Get the pedestal
00015     fPedestal = (int)pulses->GetBinCenter(pulses->GetMaximumBin());
00016     // Reset bin range
00017     pulses->GetXaxis()->SetRange();
00018 
00019     /* Get polarity */
00020     int min = 0, max = 0;
00021     bool min_found = false, max_found = false;
00022     // Again, ignore 5 bin on each side to get rid of flatlines
00023     for (int i = nBinsIgnore; i <= nbins - nBinsIgnore; ++i) {
00024       if (!min_found && pulses->GetBinContent(i) > 0.) {
00025         min_found = true;
00026         min = i;
00027       }
00028       if (!max_found && pulses->GetBinContent(nbins - i) > 0.) {
00029         max_found = true;
00030         max = nbins - i;
00031       }
00032       if (min_found && max_found)
00033         break;
00034     }
00035     if (max - fPedestal > fPedestal - min)
00036       fPolarity = 1;
00037     else
00038       fPolarity = -1;
00039   } else {
00040     // If no pulses, default to positive polarity and zero pedestal
00041     fPedestal = 0;
00042     fPolarity = 1;
00043   }
00044 
00045   /* Get Timing */
00046   // Rebin until we have plenty of samples at the peak
00047   if (timing && timing->GetEntries()) {
00048     int nRebins = 0;
00049     static int min_time_correlation_height = 10;
00050     while (timing->GetBinContent(timing->GetMaximumBin()) < min_time_correlation_height && nRebins++ < 3)
00051       timing->Rebin();
00052     fOffset = timing->GetBinCenter(timing->GetMaximumBin());
00053   } else {
00054     // If no timing, default to zero offset
00055     fOffset = 0;
00056   }
00057 }
